headers.subject: I can't get in!
headers.received: (from crawler@localhost) by crawl-1.a.markmail.int (8.13.8/8.13.8/Submit) id m7659RNJ012244 for minnie.gilmore.scott@a.markmail.org; Tue, 5 Aug 2008 22:09:27 -0700

body.para: I go to sign in to my blog and it says my username and password don't match....no biggie....when it tells me to put in the URL it sends a message to a gmail account that I DO NOT have. When I use the email I created specifically for this blog it says it does not exist. When I tried to make a new blog of the same name it said there was already one with that name. ???? I typed in the URL and it took me directly to MY PAGE so it obviously DOES exist. Why can't I log in to make some more posts???? The website doesn't recognize me, yet the
